casebody.data:
State
v.
Joshua Earl Holloman 208P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 27, 2016

Ms. Amanda S. Zimmer, Attorney at Law, Mr. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, For Holloman, Joshua Earl.

Mr. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Ms. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of May 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of May 2016."
